name: Lythe the Forgetful Witch: Web Version
name_original: Lythe the Forgetful Witch: Web Version
description: A visual novel about a witch who forgets how to use her magic. Lythe the Forgetful Witch: Prologue is a demo Visual Novel about a witch who has forgotten how to use magic. It’s a high fantasy Halloween ride, meant for those who love fun spooky themed characters! This version is meant for web. The game is made using Ren' Py.
